ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF($Profile.Name == 'System Administrator' || $Profile.Name == 'Orde Customer Community Plus User' || $Profile.Name == 'Customer Community Plus User' ,false, IF( AND( Active_Change__c == TRUE ,ISNEW()== false ,OR( ISBLANK( TEXT( Type_Change__c ) ), ISNULL( TEXT( Type_Change__c )))), true,false ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Type Change must not be null.
